122211112211121111.content:
"Come on Kurt," she said, "you can't just leave me like this!" She knew he wouldn't. Even if it was only fun for Kurt and bad for her, she knew that this was still basically just a game to him. And since its a game, she thought, that means he's not just going to take off with my pants and leave me here.

She was right, that wasn't what he was going to do. "And I'm not going to Kitty, I'm just re-offering the deal I offered earlier... with one difference."

"And the difference would be...?" A part of her was thinking that he was just going to remove the part about her having to model her underwear for him. As much as she didn't like the thought of him telling what underwear she can and can't wear, she might have actually taken that offer to get her pants back earlier if not for the modeling part.

"Not only do you have to wear whatever panties I tell you to and model them, but you will also be my wedgie slave for a month." he said with a confident smirk.

"There is no way I'm doing that!" she yelled quietly, hoping no one would hear her.

"Then I guess won't be getting these back." He held up the pants and then dangled them lower for a bit, just out of her jumping reach, before pulling them back up completely away from her.

For a moment, Kitty considered trying to call his bluff. Then she thought about if he actually just took off with her pants. She thought about sneaking around trying not to be seen. She thought about the humiliation that would ensue if she was caught. "Fine, I'll agree to this stupid deal." she practically growled out. A few octaves lower and it probably would have sounded like a growl. At least the only one seeing my underwear will be Kurt. That though did little to make the situation seem better.

Up above Kurt was grinning like a guy who had won the lottery, thrilled that this plan had worked. There was just one decision to make: what to do now.

141.title: Mystique

1412.content: Mystique was walking smartly on a cold December morning. She had important work to do and couldn't afford distraction. Unfortunately for her, she would be thoroughly distracted. She suspected nothing until she jolted to a stop at an unusual sensation coming from her panties. Looking back, she saw they'd been revealed and pulled slightly sideways. She looked about and saw no one. Irritated, she tried to move on but was stopped once again. She was now being lifted up by her periwinkle undies. They were lifting her from the back and were becoming tighter and more painful. Levitating her to a metal fence post she was left a few feet off the ground. Embarrassed, she attempted to get down. To her utter dismay and horror, her panties were now pulled at full force up her front this time. She screamed out in pain. Once again, being lifted to another fence post. In utter pain, she limply tried to touch the ground but was once more stopped. Now she was pulled from both front and back in a see saw motion. She hung like that for a couple hours, unaware of her attacker. Unknown to her, a devious Wanda was enjoying the spectacle from some bushes a good distance out of her view. Having had her fill of the older mutant's humiliation, she walked off. Leaving her on her own.
1412.title: An younger member of the brotherhood.

info.brief_description: That's right, X-Men Evolution is now in on the business of wedgies!
info.description:
The universe of X-Men Evolution isn't one that's had the wedgie treatment here yet, so lets give it to them!

Here's the rules, follow them please.

1) Any character is permitted in the story, and you can add any you wish to.

2) Keep things in good fun, don't make it overly graphic.

3) Try to write in a readable fashion. Don't make it look likea seven year olds work and try to at least have dialog marked clearly.

4) Have fun.
